heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_meepo
heroes.bio_loc: “对我而言，生活就是你所知和所能发现的一切。当你住在裂影荒墟时，想要找到食物并不是一件容易的事。因此，你需要走捷径，你需要会忽悠，你需要对自己的能力充分了解。有些野兽能够杀掉你，那么你就需要躲开强壮的，捕杀弱小的。在荒墟之上，有过一段往事，一段对某些人意义重大的往事。曾经那里有个宫殿，他们在宫殿里面举行黑暗的仪式，非常邪恶。如果你从仪式中幸存下来，他们还会以击碎水晶的方式将你的灵魂撕裂成碎片。不过他们的艺术成就也很高，比如雕塑之类的。记住这点：如果你在某个时候发现了这些雕塑，一定把他们全拿到市场上去卖掉，然后你接下来的一周都不会饿肚子。如果你走运的话，你可能会发现影墟水晶，那赶紧找人帮你估价，多问问，总有人能帮你找到需要这玩意的疯子买主的。就算别人都不要，你也可以卖给城里的魔导师，他们喜欢这玩意。不过，不管你怎么做，一定要小心这些水晶，这玩意要是在你身上炸开，可是很疼的。”
heroes.hype_loc: 米波可以召唤多达四个永久复制体，使自己同时在多条战线上作战。他的分身四散在战场上，一旦找到敌人，他就会将其束缚，其余分身在爆炸性的传送中集合，然后将遇难者亲手埋葬。

abilities.name: meepo_earthbind
abilities.desc_loc: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.lore_loc: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
notes_loc: Does not work on Debuff Immune units or Roshan.

abilities.name: meepo_poof
abilities.desc_loc:
Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for %cast_duration% seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.

If the ability is in alt-cast state, all Meepos will also cast Poof to the target. When cast on the ground, all Meepos except the selected one will Poof to the closest location.
abilities.lore_loc: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
notes_loc: Can be cast through the minimap.

abilities.name: meepo_ransack
abilities.desc_loc: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
abilities.lore_loc: So you gonna need that, or...?
notes_loc: Amount healed is amplified by Lifesteal Amplification
abilities.shard_loc: Ransack now has a 30%% chance on hit to apply a Geostrike debuff, slowing enemies by 20%% and dealing 20 DPS for 4 seconds. Instances from multiple Meepos stack.

abilities.name: meepo_petrify
abilities.desc_loc:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for %duration%s. Restores %hp_restore%%% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: meepo_megameepo
abilities.desc_loc:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a %radius% radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains %stats_pct%%% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

 When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.

abilities.name: meepo_divided_we_stand
abilities.desc_loc: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.
notes_loc: Clones can't use Arcane Boots, Guardian Greaves.
abilities.shard_loc: Divided We Stand can be cast as long as there's a Meepo within %fling_radius% radius of yourself. Causes that Meepo to fling you towards a target within a %AbilityCastRange% range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed. Mana Cost: %AbilityManaCost%
facets_loc: 现在可以在%required_level%时学习，之后每%bonus_levels_between_upgrades%级可以再升级一次，最高为%max_level%级。米波克隆体获得米波本体%main_meepo_stats_pct%%%的额外属性。
所有米波都拥有可叠加的光环，提升附近米波%support_group_attack_speed_pct%%%攻击速度和%support_group_armor%点护甲。作用范围：%support_radius%。

abilities.name: meepo_megameepo_fling
abilities.desc_loc: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a %AbilityCastRange% range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.

abilities.name: meepo_sticky_fingers
abilities.desc_loc: Has an extra choice of neutral item to select from.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_meepo_4
talents.name_loc: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

facets.description_loc: 更早获得额外米波，并且额外获得1只米波。
facets.name: meepo_more_meepo

facets.description_loc: 米波会提升其他米波的攻击速度和护甲。
facets.name: meepo_codependent

new_abilities.name: meepo_sticky_fingers
new_abilities.desc_loc: 打造中立物品时额外拥有一个选项。
